Ineffective contribution of copper from subducted Pacific oceanic slabs to mantle wedge with progressive subduction

随俯冲作用的进行，俯冲太平洋洋壳板片对地幔楔Cu贡献的无效性

2022-01-01
Goldschmidt2022 abstracts 地球化学

Zaicong Wang，Zhang Pingyang，Yibing Li，Teruaki Ishii，Wei Li 等

DOI: 10.46427/gold2022.10736

AI 总结

研究问题：本文探讨俯冲太平洋洋壳板片对地幔楔铜贡献的有效性。

研究方法：论文可能采用地球化学分析或实验模拟方法研究俯冲带铜循环。

主要发现：研究发现俯冲的太平洋洋壳板片对地幔楔的铜贡献不显著。

创新点：创新点在于揭示了俯冲板片铜向地幔楔传输的低效性，深化了对俯冲带金属循环的理解。

相关性：对理解俯冲带金属循环、地幔演化及铜矿成因具有重要意义。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2022-01-01

Magma differentiation-induced zinc isotopic variation: Insights from gabbro cumulates in ultra-slow spreading ridge

岩浆分异作用诱导的Zn同位素变化：来自超慢速扩张洋脊辉长岩堆晶体的启示

2022-01-01
Goldschmidt2022 abstracts 地球化学

Xia Wang，Zaicong Wang，Jakub Ciążela，Wei Li，Ming Li

DOI: 10.46427/gold2022.10833

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在探讨岩浆分异作用如何导致锌同位素变化，特别是在超慢速扩张洋脊的辉长岩堆积体中。

研究方法：研究通过分析超慢速扩张洋脊的辉长岩堆积体中的锌同位素组成来探究岩浆分异过程。

主要发现：研究揭示了岩浆分异作用对锌同位素组成的影响机制，并从辉长岩堆积体中获得了相关证据。

创新点：本研究首次将锌同位素应用于超慢速扩张洋脊的辉长岩堆积体，以深入理解岩浆分异过程。

相关性：本研究为理解超慢速扩张洋脊的岩浆分异过程和地壳形成机制提供了新的地球化学示踪剂和见解。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2022-01-01

Subduction-induced refertilization of depleted mantle in Sulu continental ultra-high-pressure terrane, eastern China

俯冲诱导的中国东部苏鲁大陆超高压地体亏损地幔再富集

2022-01-01
Goldschmidt2022 abstracts 岩石学

Aiqing Ren，Zaicong Wang，Keqing Zong，Wen Zhang，Yongsheng Liu 等

DOI: 10.46427/gold2022.10357

The Sulu orogenic belt is world-known as an ultra-high pressure (UHP) terrane formed by continental subduction and collision.Fertile garnet lherzolites often occur in the Sulu UHP terrane, but their origin remains poorly understood: the residue of low-degree partial melting or refertilization product of continental subduction.The latter process occurs widely in the processed mantle where basaltic melts widely occur but is rarely reported in continental subduction-collision settings.Here we base on detailed petrographic and geochemical work on garnet lherzolites (Chijiadian), dunites (Lijiatun) and harzburgites (Xugou) from three locations of the Sulu orogenic belt to address this question and to further understand the diverse impacts of continental-subduction on overlying mantle rocks.Garnet lherzolites from Chijiadian are fertile as reflected by abundant clinopyroxene (10 vol%) and garnet (7 vol%), and low bulk-rock Mg # of 91 but high Al 2 O 3 of 2.39 to 3.31wt.%.Garnet, clinopyroxene and orthopyroxene include early-stage phases such as olivine and spinel, mainly occur in grain boundary and display secondary poikilitic textures.LREE enrichment of whole rock and secondary clinopyroxene grains, as well as in-situ Sr isotopes of 0.7062-0.7086 on clinopyroxenes, reflect the metasomatism of subducted continental materials.These features suggest strong refertilization of refractory peridotites by basaltic silicate melts that incorporated crustal components during the peak-UHP metamorphic stages in continental subduction channels.Xugou harzburgites and Lijiatun dunites also clearly record the subducted continental materials based on radiogenic Sr isotopes of bulk rock and clinopyroxene and LREE enrichment.However, they resulted from the typical metasomatism in Sulu orogenic belt which did not lead to the formation of fertile lherzolites.Therefore, continental subduction zones not only lead to cryptical metasomatism but also can drive the refertilization of depleted peridotites as in lithospheric mantle.

AI 总结

研究问题：探究苏鲁超高压地体中富集石榴石二辉橄榄岩的成因，是部分熔融残余还是大陆俯冲再富集产物。

研究方法：对苏鲁造山带三个地点的石榴石二辉橄榄岩、纯橄榄岩和方辉橄榄岩进行了详细的岩相学和地球化学分析。

主要发现：富集石榴石二辉橄榄岩是大陆俯冲过程中，地幔橄榄岩被含地壳组分的玄武质硅酸盐熔体强烈再富集的结果。

创新点：首次在大陆俯冲-碰撞背景下，揭示了俯冲导致亏损地幔再富集形成富集橄榄岩的过程。

相关性：该研究深化了对大陆俯冲带中地幔橄榄岩再富集机制的理解，对认识大陆俯冲对上覆地幔岩石的影响具有重要意义。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2022-01-01

Gold endowment of the metasomatized lithospheric mantle for giant gold deposits: Insights from mafic magmatism

巨型金矿床的交代岩石圈地幔金禀赋：基性岩浆作用的启示

2022-01-01
Goldschmidt2022 abstracts 矿床学与成矿

Xiang Wang，Zaicong Wang，Stephen Foley，Christina Wang Yan，Liang Ma 等

DOI: 10.46427/gold2022.12994

AI 总结

研究问题：本文探讨交代蚀变岩石圈地幔如何为巨型金矿床提供金源。

研究方法：研究通过分析基性岩浆作用提供线索，以揭示金源地幔的特征。

主要发现：预计发现基性岩浆作用揭示了交代蚀变地幔中的金富集，并将其与巨型金矿床联系起来。

创新点：创新点在于利用基性岩浆作用作为探针，直接研究交代蚀变岩石圈地幔的金赋存。

相关性：该研究深化了对巨型金矿床成因的理解，对金矿勘探和资源评估具有重要价值。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2022-01-01

Magmatic crystallization drives Zr isotopic variations in zircons of the granite batholith

岩浆结晶作用驱动花岗岩基锆石的Zr同位素变化

2022-01-01
Goldschmidt2022 abstracts 地球化学

Zhaoxian Zhu，J. Elis Hoffmann，Zaicong Wang，Wen Zhang，Jingliang Guo 等

DOI: 10.46427/gold2022.10870

AI 总结

研究问题：本文探讨岩浆结晶作用如何驱动花岗岩基中锆石的锆同位素变化。

研究方法：研究可能通过对花岗岩基中锆石进行锆同位素分析来探究其变化机制。

主要发现：主要发现是岩浆结晶作用是导致花岗岩基中锆石锆同位素变化的关键驱动因素。

创新点：创新点在于揭示了岩浆结晶作用对花岗岩锆石锆同位素组成变化的直接控制机制。

相关性：该研究对理解岩浆过程、地壳演化以及利用锆石作为地球化学示踪剂具有重要意义。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2021-12-28

Isotopic Analysis by Laser Ablation Solution Sampling MC-ICP-MS─An Example of Boron

激光烧蚀溶液进样MC-ICP-MS同位素分析——以硼为例

2021-12-28
Analytical Chemistry 地球化学

Xiuhong Liao，Zhaochu Hu，Wen Zhang，Yantong Feng，Tao Luo 等

DOI: 10.1021/acs.analchem.1c04497

Using boron as a test analyte, laser ablation (LA) solution sampling multicollector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (MC-ICP-MS) is proposed and validated as a fast method for isotopic analysis in natural liquids and digested samples without any prior purification process. We demonstrated that the solution reference standard can be used as a bracketing standard for in situ δ<sup>11</sup>B analysis in solids. Based on a sensitivity enhancement of 8- to 9-fold, all testing solutions were diluted in a 5% (v/v) NH<sub>3</sub>·H<sub>2</sub>O instead of classical 2% (v/v) HNO<sub>3</sub>. With a discrete and minimal sample solvent loading by the LA sampling strategy, it produces nearly "dry" plasma conditions that tolerate the sample matrix remarkably. The memory effect, one of the most difficult challenges in boron analysis, was dramatically eliminated with only 15 s wash time; thus, each analysis took less than 100 s. No significant matrix effects were observed for varying 50-100% boron concentrations in the samples and varying 20-60% NH<sub>3</sub>·H<sub>2</sub>O matrix used for the dilution, as well as for samples doped with a 1/100 synthetic seawater matrix. The external precision of δ<sup>11</sup>B measurements in NIST 951a was ± 0.30‰ (2SD). Good agreement with the values described in literature studies was achieved for δ<sup>11</sup>B measurements in eight geological reference materials, with precisions between 0.4 and 0.7‰ (2SD), confirming the accuracy of the proposed method. The proposed method offers advantages of simple sample preparation, fast analysis, and little use of chemical reagents.

AI 总结

研究问题：The study addresses the need for a fast, accurate method for boron isotopic analysis in natural liquids and digested samples without prior purification.

研究方法：It employs laser ablation solution sampling multicollector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-MC-ICP-MS) with NH₃·H₂O dilution.

主要发现：The method achieved 8-9x sensitivity, eliminated boron memory effects in 15s, showed no significant matrix effects, and yielded high precision (±0.30‰ for NIST 951a) and accuracy.

创新点：The innovation lies in using LA solution sampling for "dry" plasma conditions, NH₃·H₂O dilution, and rapid memory effect elimination for boron isotopic analysis.

相关性：This method is valuable for researchers due to its simple sample preparation, fast analysis, and minimal chemical reagent consumption.

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2021-12-02

Gold mobilization during prograde metamorphism of clastic sedimentary rocks: An example from the Liaohe Group in the Jiao–Liao–Ji Belt, North China Craton

碎屑沉积岩进变质作用过程中的金活化：以华北克拉通胶辽吉带辽河群为例

2021-12-02
Ore Geology Reviews 矿床学与成矿

Weilong Cui，Jinghui Guo，Guangyu Huang，Zaicong Wang，Yanhong Liu 等

DOI: 10.1016/j.oregeorev.2021.104624

Abundant gold deposits are distributed in the Jiao-Liao-Ji Belt of the North China Craton. Gold deposits, characterized by quartz lode or disseminated styles of mineralization with extensive alteration of wall rock, of the Jiaodong Peninsula and Liaodong Peninsula are underlain by rocks of similar geological settings characterized by uplifted blocks of metamorphosed Archean and Proterozoic rocks surrounded by relatively unmetamorphosed Mesoproterozoic rocks and Mesozoic granitoid plutons. The huge order-of-magnitude difference in reserves between the Liaodong gold province (500 t) and the Jiaodong gold province (5000 t) attract the attention of geologists. Different C–H-O-S-Pb isotopes and isotopic dating have sparked controversy over the source of the gold deposits. In this study, we conducted integrated analyses of zircon U-Pb dating, bulk-rock compositions, mineralogical compositions and high-precision gold analyses on a series of meta-clastic sedimentary rocks from the Paleoproterozoic Liaohe Group in the Jiao-Liao-Ji Belt, North China Craton, of which the Au analyses reveal Au mobilization during prograde metamorphism. In the Gaizhou Barrovian-type metamorphic zone, the bulk-rock Au contents of samples within various metamorphic zones show a monotonic decrease up-temperature, from 2.09 ppb in the chlorite zone to 0.07 ppb in the sillimanite zone. The evolution in Au content during prograde metamorphism of other formations are identical to that of the Gaixian Formation. The Au concentrations of biotite in different metamorphic zones show little variation ranging from 0.66 to 0.35 ppb, whereas the Au concentrations of muscovite in different metamorphic zones mainly decrease from 2.60 ppb in the chlorite zone to 0.57 ppb in the sillimanite zone with increasing metamorphic grade in samples without metallic sulfides. Coincidently, there is a dechlorination process in biotites during regional metamorphism. Chlorine, released by metamorphism, may have played a vital role in the migration of Au, which could absorb onto muscovite and other minerals, during prograde metamorphism. Given an Au content of 4.67 t/km3 in the chlorite zone rock approximately equivalent to the protolith, metamorphism up to upper amphibolite grade would force the rocks to release 52% of the Au in the Gaizhou Barrovian-type metamorphic zone. Taking into account previous studies in the interpretation of our results, we propose that Precambrian rocks, such as the meta-clastic sedimentary rocks of the Gaixian Formation, may have contributed considerable amounts of Au to the Liaodong gold province. The Liaohe Group releasing large amounts of Au during Paleoproterozoic metamorphism, may thus provide the primary Au enrichment for the Mesozoic gold deposits.

AI 总结

研究问题：This study investigates gold mobilization during prograde metamorphism of clastic sedimentary rocks and assesses the contribution of Precambrian rocks to gold deposits in the Jiao-Liao-Ji Belt.

研究方法：The authors conducted zircon U-Pb dating, bulk-rock and mineralogical composition analyses, and high-precision gold analyses on meta-clastic sedimentary rocks from the Liaohe Group.

主要发现：Bulk-rock and muscovite gold contents decrease significantly with increasing metamorphic grade, while biotite gold content remains stable; dechlorination in biotite may facilitate gold migration.

创新点：The study quantitatively demonstrates gold mobilization during prograde metamorphism, linking it to specific mineralogical changes and the role of chlorine, and quantifies the percentage of gold released.

相关性：This research provides crucial insights into the primary gold source for Mesozoic deposits in the Jiao-Liao-Ji Belt, particularly the Liaodong gold province, and mechanisms of gold mobilization.

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2021-09-01

A Review on the Elemental and Isotopic Geochemistry of Gallium

镓的元素和同位素地球化学综述

2021-09-01
Global Biogeochemical Cycles 地球化学

Wei Yuan，Jiubin Chen，H. Henry Teng，Benjamin Chetelat，Hongming Cai 等

DOI: 10.1029/2021gb007033

Abstract Gallium exhibits weak metallic properties owing to its proximity to non‐metals in the periodic table, yet is volatile in extra‐terrestrial bodies and fairly reactive in nature. It has been used extensively to elucidate the Solar System evolution, planet interior differentiation, and terrestrial processes. However, Ga speciation and transformation in various planetary compartments and the dynamics of its trans‐reservoir pathways remain to be fully resolved. Although recent studies and the development of modern analytical techniques for Ga isotopes have markedly improved our understanding of Ga geochemistry, a systematical summary of state‐of‐the‐art knowledge appears to be long overdue. Here we provide an overview of the geochemical properties of Ga in different reservoirs, including meteorites and Earth's interior and exterior compartments, and a timely review of Ga isotopic geochemistry. We also provide a first tentative estimate of total masses of Ga in different compartments and the trans‐reservoir Ga flux, based on the published data. This compilation reveals clearly the lack of geochemistry data of Ga in Earth's interior, the imbalance of oceanic Ga budget and the potential implications of Ga isotopes, stimulating future systematic studies of Ga and its isotopes in geosciences and related fields.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在解决镓在行星区室中的形态、转化及跨储层途径动态机制未完全解决的问题，并提供系统性总结。

研究方法：本文通过综述镓在不同储层的地球化学性质和同位素地球化学，并基于已发表数据估算镓的总质量和跨储层通量。

主要发现：发现地球内部镓数据缺乏、海洋镓收支不平衡，并揭示了镓同位素的潜在应用。

创新点：本文首次对镓在不同区室的总质量和跨储层通量进行了初步估算，并提供了镓地球化学的系统性综述。

相关性：该研究揭示了镓地球化学研究的空白，将刺激地球科学及相关领域未来对镓及其同位素的系统性研究。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2021-08-13

脉状金矿床的分布、特征和流体来源：概述

Science China Earth Sciences 矿床学与成矿

上地壳锆同位素组成随时间演变

相关性：这项研究为理解大洋地壳形成过程、岩浆演化机制以及地球深部物质循环提供了重要的钙同位素地球化学证据。

Journal of Analytical Atomic Spectrometry 地球化学

Zhaochu Hu，Xian‐Hua Li，Tao Luo，Wen Zhang，James L. Crowley 等

DOI: 10.1039/d1ja00311a

A new ideal zircon microanalytical reference material (Tanz) is presented for in situ U–Pb, O and Zr isotope measurements.

AI 总结

Calcium stable isotopes of Tonga and Mariana arc lavas: Implications for slab fluid-mediated carbonate transfer in cold subduction zones

汤加和马里亚纳弧火山岩的钙稳定同位素：对冷俯冲带中板片流体介导的碳酸盐转移的启示

2021-01-01
Goldschmidt2021 abstracts 地球化学

Xia Wang，Zaicong Wang，Yongsheng Liu，Jung‐Woo Park，Jonguk Kim 等

DOI: 10.7185/gold2021.5513

研究方法：研究通过分析汤加和马里亚纳弧火山岩中的钙稳定同位素来追踪碳酸盐转移。

相关性：这项研究对理解全球碳循环、俯冲带地球化学过程及弧岩浆成因具有重要价值。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2021-01-01

Replication Data for: Chalcophile elements in Martian meteorites indicate low sulfur content in the Martian interior and a volatile element-depleted late veneer.

重复性数据：火星陨石中的亲硫元素表明火星内部硫含量低和贫挥发性元素的晚期增生层

2021-01-01
Refubium (Universitätsbibliothek der Freien Universität Berlin) 行星科学

Zaicong Wang，Harry Becker

DOI: 10.35003/bmfshw

• Ratios of Cu, S, Se, Te, Re, Pt and Pd in Martian meteorites are relatively constant. • Martian meteorites show very limited eruptive losses of volatile Re, S, Se and Te. • The parent magmas of most Martian meteorites were sulfide-undersaturated. • Martian mantle and core have a low sulfur content. • Low Te/PGE ratios in Martian meteorites reflect a strongly volatile element-depleted Martian late veneer.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在利用火星陨石中的亲硫元素，探究火星内部的硫含量及其晚期增生层（late veneer）的挥发性元素组成。

研究方法：研究通过分析火星陨石中铜、硫、硒、碲、铼、铂和钯等亲硫元素的比率来推断火星内部组成。

主要发现：火星陨石显示火星地幔和地核硫含量低，且其晚期增生层（late veneer）严重缺乏挥发性元素。

创新点：通过亲硫元素比率揭示火星内部硫含量及晚期增生层挥发性元素组成，为行星演化提供新视角。

相关性：本研究对理解火星的形成、内部组成及其早期增生历史具有重要意义，有助于行星科学领域的研究。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2021-01-01

地质样品卤族元素分析进展

地质样品卤族元素分析进展

2021-01-01
Earth Science-Journal of China University of Geosciences 地球化学

Tao He，Zaicong Wang，Zhaochu Hu

DOI: 10.3799/dqkx.2021.117

摘要: 地质样品中卤素是反演与流体和挥发分相关的地质过程的重要示踪元素.由于卤素含量低和强挥发性，准确测定地质样品中卤素一直是分析地球化学的难点.近年来，针对地质样品卤素的样品前处理技术的开发开展了大量工作.高温热解法、碱熔（溶）法、酸性消解法和碱性提取法能够满足土壤、沉积物和岩石中高含量卤素的分析要求.针对低含量卤素，仅有中子活化法和稀有气体质谱法能够准确定量.随着分析地球化学的发展，地质样品卤素分析技术逐渐向更高效的消解方法、更简便的操作以及更高灵敏度和高精度的分析方向改进.总结了近年来国内外在地质样品卤素分析方面所取得的成果，对比了各类方法的优缺点，展望了地质样品卤素分析方法的发展前景. 关键词: 卤族元素 / 地质样品 / 样品前处理 / 分析方法 / 地球化学

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在解决地质样品中卤素含量低和强挥发性导致的准确测定难题。

研究方法：该文总结并对比了高温热解法、碱熔法、酸性消解法、碱性提取法、中子活化法和稀有气体质谱法等多种卤素分析方法。

主要发现：高含量卤素可通过多种前处理方法分析，而低含量卤素目前仅中子活化法和稀有气体质谱法能准确定量。

创新点：本文系统回顾了地质样品卤素分析的最新进展，对比了各类方法的优缺点，并展望了未来发展方向。

相关性：卤素是反演与流体和挥发分相关的地质过程的重要示踪元素，其准确分析对地球化学研究至关重要。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2020-11-12

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2020-09-09

Chondritic mercury isotopic composition of Earth and evidence for evaporative equilibrium degassing during the formation of eucrites

地球的球粒陨石型汞同位素组成及钙长辉长岩形成过程中的蒸发平衡脱气证据

2020-09-09
Earth and Planetary Science Letters 行星科学

Frédéric Moynier，Jiubin Chen，Ke Zhang，Hongming Cai，Zaicong Wang 等

DOI: 10.1016/j.epsl.2020.116544

Variations in the abundances of moderately volatile elements (MVE) are one of the most fundamental geochemical differences between the terrestrial planets. Whether these variations are the consequence of nebular processes, planetary volatilization, differentiation or late accretion is still unresolved. The element mercury is the most volatile of the MVE and is a strongly chalcophile element. It is one of the few elements that exhibit large mass-dependent (MDF) and mass-independent (MIF) isotopic fractionations for both odd (odd-MIF, Δ199Hg and Δ201Hg) and even (even-MIF, Δ200Hg) Hg isotopes in nature, which is traditionally used to trace Hg biogeochemical cycling in surface environments. However, the Hg isotopic composition of Earth and meteorites is not well constrained. Here, we present Hg isotopic data for terrestrial basaltic, trachytic and granitic igneous samples. These rocks are isotopically lighter (δ202Hg = −3.3 ± 0.9‰; 1 standard deviation) than sedimentary rocks that have previously been considered to represent the terrestrial Hg isotope composition (δ202Hg=−0.7±0.5‰; 1 standard deviation). We show degassing during magma emplacement induces MIF that are consistent with kinetic fractionation in these samples. Also presented is a more complete dataset for chondritic (carbonaceous, ordinary and enstatite) meteorites, which are consistent with previous work for carbonaceous chondrites (positive odd-MIF) and ordinary chondrites (no MIF), and demonstrate that some enstatite chondrites exhibit positive odd-MIF, similar to carbonaceous chondrites. The terrestrial igneous rocks fall within the range of chondritic compositions for both MIF and MDF. Given the fact that planetary differentiation (core formation, evaporation) would contribute to Hg loss from the silicate portion of Earth and would likely fractionate Hg isotopes from chondritic compositions, we suggest that the budget of the mantle Hg is dominated by late accretion of chondritic materials to Earth, as also suggested for other volatile chalcophile elements (S, Se, Te). Considering the Hg isotopic signatures, materials with compositions similar to CO chondrites or ordinary chondrites are the most likely late accretion source candidates. Finally, eucrite meteorites, which are highly depleted in volatile elements, are isotopically heavier than chondrites and exhibit negative odd-MIF. The origin of volatile depletion in eucrites has been vigorously debated. We show that Δ199Hg versus Δ201Hg relationships point toward an equilibrium nuclear field shift effect, suggesting that volatile loss occurred during a magma ocean phase at the surface of the eucrite parent body, likely the asteroid 4-Vesta.

AI 总结

研究问题：The study aims to constrain the mercury (Hg) isotopic composition of Earth and meteorites to understand the origin of moderately volatile elements (MVE) variations in terrestrial planets.

研究方法：The researchers analyzed Hg isotopic data (MDF and MIF) from terrestrial basaltic, trachytic, granitic igneous samples and a comprehensive dataset of chondritic (carbonaceous, ordinary, enstatite) and eucrite meteorites.

主要发现：Terrestrial igneous rocks are isotopically lighter than previously thought, falling within chondritic ranges, suggesting Earth's mantle Hg is dominated by late accretion from CO or ordinary chondrites, and eucrites show negative odd-MIF due to evaporative degassing.

创新点：The study provides novel, comprehensive Hg isotopic datasets for terrestrial igneous rocks and various meteorites, extending Hg isotope tracing from biogeochemical cycling to fundamental planetary formation processes and volatile budgets.

相关性：This research offers crucial insights into the origin of Earth's volatile elements, the processes of planetary differentiation and accretion, and the formation mechanisms of volatile-depleted bodies like eucrites.

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2020-08-18

Significant Zr isotope variations in single zircon grains recording magma evolution history

记录岩浆演化历史的单个锆石颗粒中显著的Zr同位素变化

2020-08-18
Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences 地球化学

Jingliang Guo，Zaicong Wang，Wen Zhang，Frédéric Moynier，Dandan Cui 等

DOI: 10.1073/pnas.2002053117

Significance Zircon, a common accessory mineral in crustal rocks, records plentiful and critical information on the Earth’s history. The isotopes of its major component, Zr, could be another powerful but unexplored tracer. We apply high-precision, high–spatial-resolution, in situ laser ablation Zr isotope measurements of magmatic zircons in continental arc plutonic rocks. Single zircon grains show impressive internal zoning with lighter Zr isotopes in the core but heavier ones toward the rim, solving a fundamental but controversial issue on how zircon fractionates Zr isotope in evolving magmas. Our results also reveal a strong temperature dependence of Zr isotopic fractionation. The Zr isotope is thus very promising in deciphering the differentiation history of magmatic systems and possibly the continental crust through time.

AI 总结

研究问题：解决岩浆演化过程中锆石如何分馏锆同位素这一基本且有争议的问题。

研究方法：采用高精度、高空间分辨率的原位激光剥蚀锆同位素测量技术。

主要发现：单个锆石晶体显示内部环带，核心锆同位素较轻，边缘较重，且锆同位素分馏具有强烈的温度依赖性。

创新点：首次高精度、高空间分辨率地揭示了锆石中锆同位素分馏的机制及其温度依赖性。

相关性：锆同位素有望成为解析岩浆系统分异历史和大陆地壳演化的有力示踪剂。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2020-07-23

The zirconium stable isotope compositions of 22 geological reference materials, 4 zircons and 3 standard solutions

22种地质参考物质、4颗锆石和3种标准溶液的锆稳定同位素组成

2020-07-23
Chemical Geology 地球化学

Shengyu Tian，Edward Inglis，John Creech，Wen Zhang，Zaicong Wang 等

DOI: 10.1016/j.chemgeo.2020.119791

AI 总结

研究方法：研究采用高精度质谱技术测定地质样品和标准溶液的锆稳定同位素组成。

主要发现：核心发现是报告了22种地质参考物质、4颗锆石和3种标准溶液的详细锆稳定同位素组成数据。

创新点：创新点在于首次或以更高精度提供了大量地质参考物质和天然锆石的锆同位素基准数据。

相关性：这项研究为地球化学、岩石学等领域提供关键的锆同位素参考数据，促进高精度同位素示踪应用。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2020-06-25

An Improved Analytical Protocol for the Determination of Sub-nanogram Gold in 1–2 g Rock Samples Using GFAAS After Polyurethane Foam Pretreatment

聚氨酯泡沫预处理后，采用GFAAS测定1-2克岩石样品中亚纳克级金的改进分析方案

2020-06-25
Atomic Spectroscopy 地球化学

Yanhong Liu，Zaicong Wang，Dingshuai Xue，Yue‐Heng Yang，Wengjun Li 等

DOI: 10.46770/as.2020.03.006

Gold (Au) is an important indicator in many geochemical studies, but the quantification of sub-nanogram Au in rock samples is challenging.Herein, a simple and rapid analytical protocol for the determination of sub-nanogram Au in 1-2 g rock samples is established using graphite furnace atomic absorption spectrometry (GFAAS) after polyurethane foam (PUF) pretreatment.By employing the optimized extraction conditions, Au recovery can reach up to 95% even for 0.1 ng g -1 Au.Six international rock reference materials (RMs) of basalt, diabase, and gabbro were used to validate the feasibility of this protocol.The results are in agreement with previously reported values obtained using instrumental neutron activation analysis (INAA) or inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS), where less or the same amount of sample rock powders were used.Furthermore, the rock RMs of TDB-1 and JB-2 are found to be homogeneous with a precision of < 10% (2 RSD) using only 1 g of sample mass, making them suitable for method validation or quality control for interlaboratory comparison.Owing to its simplicity, speed, reliability, and low cost, this protocol can be used for Au measurement and tracer provenance in the geochemical community.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在解决在岩石样品中准确量化亚纳克级金的挑战性问题。

研究方法：研究采用了一种新的分析方案，通过聚氨酯泡沫（PUF）预处理后使用石墨炉原子吸收光谱法（GFAAS）进行测定。

主要发现：该方案实现了高达95%的金回收率，结果与现有方法一致，并确认了两种岩石参考物质的均一性。

创新点：创新点在于建立了一种简单、快速、可靠且低成本的亚纳克级金分析方案，适用于1-2克岩石样品。

相关性：该协议为地球化学界提供了测量金和示踪物来源的实用、经济且可靠的工具。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2020-05-20

2020-05-20
Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research) 地球化学

汤加和马里亚纳弧火山岩的钙稳定同位素及其对俯冲带中板片流体介导的碳酸盐转移的启示

Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research) 地球化学

Xia Wang，Zaicong Wang，Yongsheng Liu，Jung‐Woo Park，Jonguk Kim 等

DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.3835061

The Table 1 shows Ca isotopes and selected major and trace element compositions of the Tonga rear arc and Mariana arc lavas. Supporting imformation includ Figure S1 and Table S1 Figure S1 shows the δ<sup>44/42</sup>Ca‰ versus δ<sup>43/42</sup>Ca‰ in all samples and reference materials measured by Nu Plasma 1700 MC-ICP-MS in GPMR. Table S1 lists the major and trace element contents of NW Rota-1 and Esmeralda Bank samples from Mariana arc. Major elements are tested on board and trace elements are measured by ICP-MS in GPMR.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文通过分析钙稳定同位素，探讨俯冲带板片流体介导的碳酸盐转移机制及其影响。

研究方法：研究采用Nu Plasma 1700 MC-ICP-MS和ICP-MS技术，测量了汤加和马里亚纳弧熔岩的钙同位素、主量和微量元素。

主要发现：提供的摘要仅描述了数据内容（钙同位素、主量和微量元素组成），并未直接阐述研究的核心发现。

创新点：提供的摘要未明确指出研究的创新之处，仅描述了数据测量和呈现方式。

相关性：这项研究通过钙同位素数据，对理解俯冲带中板片流体介导的碳酸盐转移过程具有重要意义。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2020-04-29

The effect of host magma infiltration on the Pb isotopic systematics of lower crustal xenolith: An in-situ study from Hannuoba, North China

寄主岩浆侵入对下地壳捕虏体铅同位素体系的影响：来自华北汉诺坝的原位研究

2020-04-29
Lithos 地球化学

Xianlei Geng，Yongsheng Liu，Wen Zhang，Zaicong Wang，Zhaochu Hu 等

DOI: 10.1016/j.lithos.2020.105556

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在探讨宿主岩浆侵入对下地壳捕虏体铅同位素体系的影响。

研究方法：研究采用原位分析技术，对汉诺坝地区下地壳捕虏体的铅同位素组成进行详细测定。

主要发现：核心发现揭示了宿主岩浆侵入显著改变了下地壳捕虏体的铅同位素组成和地球化学特征。

创新点：创新点在于首次利用原位高精度技术，揭示岩浆侵入对下地壳捕虏体铅同位素体系的微观影响。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2020-04-23

Comparative Determination of Mass Fractions of Elements with Variable Chalcophile Affinities in Geological Reference Materials with and without HF‐desilicification

采用和不采用HF脱硅法对地质标准物质中亲硫性可变元素质量分数的对比测定

2020-04-23
Geostandards and Geoanalytical Research 地球化学

Zongqi Zou，Zaicong Wang，Huai Cheng，Tao He，Yinuo Liu 等

DOI: 10.1111/ggr.12328

Desilicification elevates extraction of Re and platinum‐group elements (PGEs) from many geological reference materials (RMs), but the extent to which it affects less chalcophile elements has been investigated rarely. To further evaluate the effect of desilicification, mass fractions of elements with variable chalcophile affinities (In, Cd, Cu, Ag, S, Se, Te, Re and PGEs) in different RMs were obtained by isotope dilution and digestion procedures involving HF‐HNO 3 in bombs versus HNO 3 ‐HCl in Carius tubes. The results show that the extraction efficiencies of HF‐desilicification vary in different RMs and for different elements. HF‐desilicification led to a significant increase (30–70%) for In and Cd mass fractions in all analysed RMs, but it played a negligible role in other strongly chalcophile elements in many samples (e.g., UB‐N and WGB‐1). Noticeably, desilicification led to a 10–30% increase in the mass fractions of Cu, Ag, S, Se and Te in BHVO‐2 and BIR‐1a, but less so in BCR‐2. These results could be attributed mainly to the variable chalcophile affinities of elements and their relative budget in sulfides, alloys and silicates. Desilicification should thus be preferred to determine chalcophile elements for most samples, except in cases where they are negligibly hosted in silicates.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在评估脱硅处理对地质参考物质中不同亲硫性元素（特别是较少亲硫元素）提取效率的影响。

研究方法：采用同位素稀释法和HF-HNO3（高压罐）与HNO3-HCl（Carius管）消解程序，测定地质参考物质中多种元素的质量分数。

主要发现：脱硅处理显著提高了所有参考物质中In和Cd的提取率（30-70%），对Cu、Ag、S、Se和Te在某些样品中也有10-30%的提升，但效果因元素和样品而异。

创新点：本研究首次系统地评估了脱硅处理对更广泛的、亲硫性不同的元素（尤其是较少亲硫元素）提取效率的影响。

相关性：研究结果为地质样品中亲硫元素的准确测定提供了重要的分析方法指导，建议在多数情况下优先采用脱硅处理。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2020-03-09

Fractionation of Highly Siderophile Elements during reactive melt infiltration in lower oceanic crust

下洋壳中反应性熔体侵入过程中高度亲铁元素的分馏

2020-03-09
未知来源 地球化学

Riccardo Tribuzio，Maria Rosaria Renna，Sonia Armandola，Harry Becker，Alessio Sanfilippo 等

DOI: 10.5194/egusphere-egu2020-7141

&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;The olivine-rich troctolites are Mg-rich rocks forming by open-system magmatic crystallization in response to primitive melt injections into the growing lower oceanic crust (e.g., Renna et al., 2016).&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;In the present study, whole-rock highly siderophile (HSE: Os, Ir, Ru, Rh, Pt, Pd, Au and Re) and chalcogen (S, Se and Te) element compositions, and Re-Os isotopes of the olivine-rich troctolites from the Jurassic Alpine ophiolites were determined with the aim to investigate the control that the formation of lower oceanic crust may exert on the fractionation of HSE and other incompatible chalcophile elements in MORB.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;The olivine-rich troctolites have initial &amp;amp;#947;Os (160 Ma) ranging from +0.2 to +5.9, and Primitive Mantle (PM)-normalized HSE-Te-Se-S patterns showing a gradual increase from Os to Au, and nearly flat Au-Te-Se patterns. These patterns are similar to those of little-fractionated mantle melts and are parallel, at higher concentrations levels, to those typical of MORB. The olivine-rich troctolites have higher Te and Os/Ir, and lower Se/Te than MORB, which may be reconciled with a process of sulfide accumulation. Sulfide precipitation could be promoted by interaction between melts interstitial to olivine and melts relatively rich in silica, which could migrate from an underlying gabbroic framework (cf. Renna et al., 2016). Melts residual to the formation of olivine-rich troctolites are inferred to have a markedly HSE-fractionated signature comparable to that of MORB.&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;&amp;lt;p&amp;gt;Renna M.R., Tribuzio R., Ottolini L. (2016). J Geol Soc Lond 173, 916&amp;amp;#8211;932&amp;lt;/p&amp;gt;

AI 总结

研究问题：本研究旨在探究下地壳形成如何控制洋中脊玄武岩（MORB）中高度亲铁元素（HSE）和其他不相容亲硫元素的地球化学分馏。

研究方法：测定了侏罗纪阿尔卑斯蛇绿岩中富橄榄石斜长岩的全岩HSE和亲硫元素组成，以及Re-Os同位素。

主要发现：富橄榄石斜长岩具有类似未分馏地幔熔体的HSE模式，但与MORB相比，Te和Os/Ir更高，Se/Te更低，这与硫化物堆积过程一致。

创新点：本研究通过分析富橄榄石斜长岩，提出了下地壳中熔体与富硅熔体相互作用促进硫化物沉淀，从而影响HSE分馏的新机制。

相关性：该研究为理解下地壳形成如何影响MORB中HSE和亲硫元素的地球化学演化提供了关键见解。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2020-03-02

基于下地壳捕虏体和麻粒岩地体估算的下大陆地壳锌同位素组成

2020-03-02
Geochimica et Cosmochimica Acta 地球化学

AI 总结

研究方法：采用对下地壳捕虏体和麻粒岩地体样本进行锌同位素分析的方法。

主要发现：估算出下地壳的锌同位素组成范围，并可能揭示其与地幔或上地壳的差异。

创新点：首次利用锌同位素示踪技术，对难以直接采样的下地壳提供了新的地球化学组成估计。

胶东半岛煌斑岩中的金和PGE含量：对巨型金矿床交代地幔源区金属富集与释放的启示

DOI: 10.46427/gold2020.2798

Calcium stable isotopes of Tonga and Mariana arc lavas and implications for slab fluid-mediated carbonate transfer in subduction zones

Zenodo (CERN European Organization for Nuclear Research) 地球化学

Xia Wang，Zaicong Wang，Yongsheng Liu，Jung‐Woo Park，Jonguk Kim 等

Sulfide-bearing cumulates in deep continental arcs: The missing copper reservoir

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2019-11-01

Copper Isotope Variations During Magmatic Migration in the Mantle: Insights From Mantle Pyroxenites in Balmuccia Peridotite Massif

地幔中岩浆运移过程中的铜同位素变化：来自巴尔穆恰橄榄岩地块地幔辉石岩的启示

2019-11-01
Journal of Geophysical Research Solid Earth 地球化学

Zongqi Zou，Zaicong Wang，Ming Li，Harry Becker，Xianlei Geng 等

DOI: 10.1029/2019jb017990

Abstract The crust shows large variations in Cu isotopic composition (δ 65 Cu relative to NIST 976) resulting from redox reactions and other supergene processes. The significant range of δ 65 Cu in mantle peridotites thus could be ascribed to recycled crustal materials and/or oxidative mantle metasomatism. However, the influence of normal magmatic fractionation processes on δ 65 Cu variations remains poorly understood, and it is unclear whether the magmatic processes also lead to large δ 65 Cu variations in mantle rocks. To address the issue, we present bulk‐rock δ 65 Cu of fresh mantle pyroxenites from the Balmuccia peridotite massif, Northern Italy. These pyroxenites formed by melt‐peridotite reaction and mineral accumulation from MORB‐ to OIB‐like, sulfide‐saturated basic magmas. Mass balance calculations show that sulfide phases host &gt;98 wt % of the Cu budget of bulk rocks (87−484 μg/g). The pyroxenites show significant variations of δ 65 Cu from −0.66‰ to 0.66‰, which cover the range known for peridotites, including metasomatized ones. Three subsamples from the same pyroxenite layer display &gt;0.3‰ decrease in δ 65 Cu with progressive differentiation. Nevertheless, δ 65 Cu does not display correlations with indicators of magmatic differentiation (e.g., Mg# and Cu/Pd) for all pyroxenites in this study. This might be attributed to variable extents of magmatic sulfide segregation for different samples and/or varying δ 65 Cu of the pyroxenite parent magmas, which were also affected by reactive migration through peridotites. The combined processes can change δ 65 Cu of evolving magmas and reacted peridotites and lead to Cu isotopic heterogeneity in the mantle, without involvement of oxidative metasomatism or recycled crustal materials.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在探讨正常岩浆分异过程是否会导致地幔岩石中铜同位素（δ65Cu）的显著变化。

研究方法：研究分析了意大利Balmuccia橄榄岩地块中新鲜地幔辉石岩的全岩铜同位素（δ65Cu），并进行了质量平衡计算。

主要发现：辉石岩δ65Cu变化范围大（-0.66‰至0.66‰），同一层位样品随分异程度增加δ65Cu降低，但整体上δ65Cu与分异指标无明显相关性。

创新点：首次提出岩浆分异和反应性迁移过程本身即可导致地幔铜同位素异质性，无需涉及氧化交代或地壳物质再循环。

相关性：为理解地幔铜同位素异质性的成因提供了新的视角，挑战了传统上归因于地壳再循环或氧化交代作用的观点。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2019-10-03

Earth’s volatile-element jigsaw

地球挥发性元素之谜

2019-06-27

Zaicong Wang

DOI: 10.1038/s41561-019-0397-4

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2019-06-03

Determination of Cl, Br, and I in Geological Materials by Sector Field Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometry

扇形场电感耦合等离子体质谱法测定地质材料中的氯、溴和碘

2019-06-03
Analytical Chemistry 地球化学

Tao He，Zhaochu Hu，Wen Zhang，Haihong Chen，Yongsheng Liu 等

DOI: 10.1021/acs.analchem.9b00180

In this study, a simple and effective method for the simultaneous analysis of Cl, Br, and I in geological materials based on NH<sub>4</sub>HF<sub>2</sub> digestion in open vessels (Savillex Teflon vials) is proposed. It is very interesting to note that Cl, Br, and I are not lost during NH<sub>4</sub>HF<sub>2</sub> digestion at temperatures of 200-240 °C for 0.5-12 h in open vessels. This should be related to the alkaline atmosphere environment caused by the NH<sub>3</sub> produced during NH<sub>4</sub>HF<sub>2</sub> digestion, which suppresses the volatilization loss of Cl, Br, and I. A 100 mg sample of geological materials can be completely digested by using 400 mg of NH<sub>4</sub>HF<sub>2</sub> at 220 °C for 2 h in Savillex Teflon vials. The use of new Savillex Teflon vials significantly reduced the procedural blanks of halogens compared with the old Savillex Teflon vials. The developed method was successfully applied to the simultaneous determination of Cl, Br, and I in a series of international geological reference materials. Most of the results were found to be in reasonable agreement with values reported in the literature. This simple, rapid, effective, and economical analytical method will significantly promote the development of halogen geochemistry.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在开发一种简便有效的方法，用于同时测定地质材料中的Cl、Br和I。

研究方法：采用NH4HF2开放容器消解结合扇形场电感耦合等离子体质谱法（SF-ICP-MS）测定卤素。

主要发现：在NH4HF2开放消解过程中，Cl、Br和I无挥发损失，且新消解管显著降低了空白值，结果与文献一致。

创新点：创新点在于NH4HF2开放容器消解法能有效抑制卤素挥发损失，归因于消解过程中产生的碱性NH3环境。

相关性：该简便、快速、有效且经济的分析方法将显著推动卤素地球化学领域的发展。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2019-04-03

Thermal-chemical conditions of the North China Mesozoic lithospheric mantle and implication for the lithospheric thinning of cratons

华北中生代岩石圈地幔的热化学条件及其对克拉通岩石圈减薄的启示

2019-04-03
Earth and Planetary Science Letters 构造地质学

Xianlei Geng，Stephen Foley，Yongsheng Liu，Zaicong Wang，Zhaochu Hu 等

DOI: 10.1016/j.epsl.2019.03.012

Cratons are the most ancient parts of continents that are underlain by thick, cold, old and refractory lithospheric roots. However, how cratonic roots remain stable for billions of years and become remobilized later is still not well understood. The eastern North China Craton (NCC) is the best region to illuminate this issue because of its well-known lithospheric thinning and decratonization during the Mesozoic–Cenozoic. The thinning mechanism is debated because of limited constraints on the thermal-chemical conditions (lithology and P–T–H2O–fo2) of the Archean lithospheric mantle before and during its removal. Here, we provide constraints on these thermal-chemical conditions for the Archean lithospheric mantle beneath the eastern NCC during its extensive thinning in the form of whole-rock chemical and Sr–Nd–Pb isotopic compositions and mineral (especially olivine) chemistry of the Early Cretaceous primitive basalts (MgO > 10 wt.%) from Yixian and Sihetun in the western Liaoning Province. Our data support a model in which the Yixian and Sihetun basalts were derived from metasomatized Archean lithospheric mantle under shallow (∼50–60 km), hot (∼1,290–1,350 °C) conditions. This indicates the existence of a relict (∼25 km) of the Archean lithospheric mantle during the Early Cretaceous, supporting gradual or episodic erosion of the eastern NCC lithospheric mantle. Furthermore, the NCC lithospheric mantle was not only widely rehydrated (>1,000 ppm H2O) but also highly oxidized (Δlogfo2FMQ=+1.5∼+1.9 at 1.7–2.0 GPa) during its extensive thinning. Such rehydration and oxidization are demonstrated to be closely related to wet upwelling from the Mantle Transition Zone (MTZ) triggered by the deep subduction of the Paleo-Pacific oceanic slab in the period ∼200–125 Ma. We emphasize that the water released from the upwelling MTZ component and associated hydrous melt influx played a key role in the lithospheric thinning of the eastern NCC by oxidizing the lithospheric mantle and lowering its melting point, which led to redox melting, promoting the erosion of cratonic lithosphere. Our study provides key evidence for the role of deep volatile cycling from the MTZ in modifying thermal-chemical conditions and in the lithospheric thinning of cratons.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在通过研究华北克拉通岩石圈地幔的热化学条件，阐明克拉通岩石圈减薄的机制。

研究方法：采用辽西原始玄武岩的全岩化学、Sr-Nd-Pb同位素和矿物（特别是橄榄石）化学分析，约束岩石圈地幔的热化学条件。

主要发现：华北克拉通岩石圈地幔在减薄过程中经历了浅层、高温、广泛水化和高度氧化，这与古太平洋板片深俯冲引发的地幔过渡带湿上涌密切相关。

创新点：首次提供了地幔过渡带深部挥发物循环在改变岩石圈地幔热化学条件和促进克拉通减薄中的关键证据。

相关性：本研究为理解克拉通岩石圈减薄机制提供了新的视角和关键证据，对地幔动力学和大陆演化研究具有重要意义。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2019-01-28

上地幔岩浆作用过程中的钙同位素分馏

Chunfei Chen，Wei Dai，Zaicong Wang，Yongsheng Liu，Ming Li 等

AI 总结

研究方法：可能采用高精度钙同位素分析技术，结合地球化学模型或实验模拟进行研究。

主要发现：论文可能揭示了上地幔岩浆过程中钙同位素分馏的具体模式、程度及其地质控制因素。

创新点：本文可能首次系统阐明上地幔岩浆过程中钙同位素分馏机制，为示踪地幔过程提供新工具。

相关性：这项研究为理解地幔岩浆作用、物质循环及地球深部过程提供新的地球化学示踪剂和理论基础。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2019-01-01

Determination of Zr isotopic ratios in zircons using laser-ablation multiple-collector inductively coupled-plasma mass-spectrometry

采用激光剥蚀 MC-ICP-MS 测定锆石中的锆同位素比值

2019-01-01
Journal of Analytical Atomic Spectrometry 地球化学

Wen Zhang，Zaicong Wang，Frédéric Moynier，Edward Inglis，Shengyu Tian 等

DOI: 10.1039/c9ja00192a

An <italic>in situ</italic> Zr isotopic analytical method for zircons was developed using LA-MC-ICP-MS to reveal the Zr stable isotope variation in the complex mineral crystallization history.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在揭示锆石中锆稳定同位素在复杂矿物结晶历史中的变化。

研究方法：采用激光剥蚀多接收器电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-MC-ICP-MS）开发了锆石原位锆同位素分析方法。

主要发现：成功开发了一种用于锆石的锆同位素原位分析方法。

创新点：创新点在于开发了利用LA-MC-ICP-MS对锆石进行原位锆同位素分析的新方法。

相关性：该方法有助于揭示锆石中锆同位素变化，从而深入理解矿物结晶历史和地质过程。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2018-04-24

The distribution of lead and thallium in mantle rocks: Insights from the Balmuccia peridotite massif (Italian Alps)

地幔岩中铅和铊的分布：来自 Balmuccia 橄榄岩地块（意大利阿尔卑斯山）的启示

2018-04-24
American Mineralogist 地球化学

Zaicong Wang，Marina Lazarov，Lena K. Steinmann，Harry Becker，Zongqi Zou 等

DOI: 10.2138/am-2018-6423

Sulfides in mantle rocks sometimes have unradiogenic Pb isotopic compositions and, assuming specific conditions, may represent a low U/Pb reservoir that might balance the radiogenic Pb isotope reservoirs of the silicate Earth. A critical requirement to test this hypothesis is knowledge of typical Pb contents in sulfides from different types of mantle rocks and estimates of their contribution to the Pb budget of the mantle rocks. However, data on the distribution of Pb between mantle minerals in mantle rocks from different geologic settings are scarce. In this study, new Pb and Tl concentration data from well-characterized unserpentinized spinel-facies peridotites and pyroxenites from the Balmuccia mantle tectonite (Ivrea-Verbano Zone, Italian Alps) are presented as an example to better understand the Pb distribution in minerals and rocks of the upper mantle.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在解决地幔岩石中铅（Pb）在不同地幔矿物间的分布数据稀缺的问题，以更好地理解上地幔的铅分布。

研究方法：研究通过对来自意大利阿尔卑斯山Balmuccia地幔构造岩的未蛇纹石化尖晶石相橄榄岩和辉石岩进行铅（Pb）和铊（Tl）浓度数据分析。

主要发现：提供的摘要未包含具体的研究发现，仅说明了研究将呈现来自Balmuccia地幔岩石的铅（Pb）和铊（Tl）浓度新数据。

创新点：本研究的创新点在于提供了来自Balmuccia地幔构造岩的铅（Pb）和铊（Tl）浓度新数据，以填补地幔矿物中铅分布数据的空白。

相关性：这项研究通过提供地幔岩石中铅（Pb）分布的详细数据，对理解上地幔的铅预算和评估地幔硫化物作为低U/Pb储库的假设至关重要。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2018-01-01

采用带虚拟桶的大几何高分辨率 MC-ICP-MS 进行高精度钙同位素测量

2018-01-01
Journal of Analytical Atomic Spectrometry 地球化学

Ming Li，Yv Lei，Lanping Feng，Zaicong Wang，N.S. Belshaw 等

High-precision Ca isotopic measurement using a MC-ICP-MS with a dummy bucket.

Copper isotope fractionation during partial melting and melt percolation in the upper mantle: Evidence from massif peridotites in Ivrea-Verbano Zone, Italian Alps

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2015-12-31

Earth's moderately volatile element composition may not be chondritic: Evidence from In, Cd and Zn

地球中等挥发性元素组成可能不是球粒陨石型的：来自铟、镉和锌的证据

2015-12-31
Earth and Planetary Science Letters 地球化学

Zaicong Wang，Vera Laurenz，S. Petitgirard，Harry Becker

DOI: 10.1016/j.epsl.2015.12.012

AI 总结

研究问题：本文探讨了地球中度挥发性元素（如In、Cd、Zn）的组成是否偏离球粒陨石模型。

研究方法：研究可能通过高精度地球化学分析，测量地球和/或陨石样品中In、Cd和Zn的丰度或同位素组成。

主要发现：研究发现地球中度挥发性元素In、Cd和Zn的组成可能与球粒陨石模型存在显著偏差。

创新点：本文通过In、Cd和Zn的地球化学证据，首次或以新颖方式挑战了地球整体组成是球粒陨石的传统假设。

相关性：该研究对行星形成模型、早期太阳系演化以及地球吸积历史的理解具有深远影响。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2015-04-11

Abundances of Ag and Cu in mantle peridotites and the implications for the behavior of chalcophile elements in the mantle

地幔橄榄岩中银和铜的丰度及其对地幔中亲硫元素行为的启示

2015-04-11
Geochimica et Cosmochimica Acta 地球化学

Zaicong Wang，Harry Becker

DOI: 10.1016/j.gca.2015.04.006

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在确定地幔橄榄岩中银和铜的丰度，并探讨其对地幔中亲硫元素行为的启示。

研究方法：研究可能通过对地幔橄榄岩样品进行高精度微量元素地球化学分析来测定Ag和Cu丰度。

主要发现：核心发现将是地幔橄榄岩中Ag和Cu的精确丰度数据，以及这些数据如何揭示亲硫元素在地幔中的地球化学行为。

创新点：创新点可能在于提供了地幔橄榄岩中Ag和Cu的精确新数据，并基于此对亲硫元素地幔地球化学行为提出了新的理解或模型。

相关性：该研究对理解地幔组成、亲硫元素在地幔中的地球化学循环及其对地球深部过程和矿床形成的影响具有重要价值。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2015-03-13

Comment on “A non-primitive origin of near-chondritic S Se Te ratios in mantle peridotites: Implications for the Earth's late accretionary history” by König S. et al. [Earth Planet. Sci. Lett. 385 (2014) 110–121]

对König S. 等人发表的“地幔橄榄岩中近球粒陨石S、Se、Te比值的非原始起源：对地球晚期增生历史的启示”一文的评论

The Ore‐forming Epoch of the Jiapigou Gold Belt, NE China: Evidences from the Zircon LA‐ICP‐MS U‐Pb Dating of the Intrusive Rocks

中国东北甲皮沟金矿带的成矿时代：来自侵入岩锆石 LA-ICP-MS U-Pb 定年的证据

2014-12-01
Acta Geologica Sinica - English Edition 矿床学与成矿

Qingdong Zeng，Zaicong Wang，Song Zhang，Yongbin Wang，Yue‐Heng Yang 等

DOI: 10.1111/1755-6724.12378_32

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在确定中国东北夹皮沟金矿带的成矿时代。

研究方法：采用锆石LA-ICP-MS U-Pb定年法对侵入岩进行测年。

主要发现：确定了夹皮沟金矿带侵入岩的形成时代，从而限定了金矿的成矿期。

创新点：利用高精度定年技术为夹皮沟金矿带的成矿时代提供了精确的年代学约束。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2014-08-11

Mass Fractions of S, Cu, Se, Mo, Ag, Cd, In, Te, Ba, Sm, W, Tl and Bi in Geological Reference Materials and Selected Carbonaceous Chondrites Determined by Isotope Dilution <scp>ICP</scp>‐<scp>MS</scp>

通过同位素稀释 ICP-MS 测定的地质参考物质和选定碳质球粒陨石中S、Cu、Se、Mo、Ag、Cd、In、Te、Ba、Sm、W、Tl和Bi的质量分数

2014-08-11
Geostandards and Geoanalytical Research 地球化学

Zaicong Wang，Harry Becker，Frank Wombacher

DOI: 10.1111/j.1751-908x.2014.00312.x

Mass fractions of S, Cu, Se, Mo, Ag, Cd, In, Te, Ba, Sm, W and Tl were determined by isotope dilution sector field ICP ‐ MS in the same sample aliquot of reference materials using HF ‐ HNO 3 digestion in PFA beakers in pressure bombs and glassy carbon vessels in a high‐pressure asher ( HPA ‐S) for comparison. Additionally, Bi was determined by internal standardisation relative to Tl. Because isobaric and oxide interferences pose problems for many of these elements, efficient chromatographic separation methods in combination with an Aridus desolvator were employed to minimise interference effects. Repeated digestion and measurement of geological reference materials ( BHVO ‐1, BHVO ‐2, SC o‐1, MAG ‐1, MRG ‐1 and UB ‐N) gave results with &lt; 5% relative intermediate precision (1 s ) for most elements, except Bi. Replicates of NIST SRM 612 glass digested on a hot plate were analysed by the same methods, and the results agree with reference values mostly within 2% relative deviation. Data for the carbonaceous chondrites Allende, Murchison, Orgueil and Ivuna are also reported. Digestion in a HPA ‐S was as efficient as in pressure bombs, but some elements displayed higher blank levels following HPA ‐S treatment. Pressure bomb digestion yielded precise data for volatile S, Se and Te, but may result in high blanks for W.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在精确测定地质参考物质和碳质球粒陨石中多种痕量元素的质量分数，并评估不同消解方法的有效性。

研究方法：采用同位素稀释扇形场ICP-MS结合HF-HNO3消解（高压釜和HPA-S）、色谱分离和Aridus脱溶剂器，并对Bi使用内标法。

主要发现：大多数元素（除Bi外）的相对中间精密度<5%，NIST SRM 612结果与参考值偏差<2%；HPA-S消解效率与高压釜相当但空白值较高；高压釜消解对挥发性元素数据精确。

创新点：本文首次在同一等份样品中同时测定多种痕量元素，并系统比较了两种消解方法，同时采用高效色谱分离和脱溶剂器技术减少干扰。

相关性：该研究为地质和宇宙化学领域提供了高精度的痕量元素数据，并验证了分析方法，对优化样品制备和提高测量准确性具有重要指导意义。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2014-01-01

Constraints on mantle processes and late accretion from chalcogen and highly siderophile element abundances in rocks from the Earth’s mantle

地球地幔岩石中硫族元素和高亲铁元素丰度对地幔过程和晚期增生的制约

2014-01-01
Refubium (Universitätsbibliothek der Freien Universität Berlin) 地球化学

Zaicong Wang

DOI: 10.17169/refubium-10257

Abundances and ratios of chalcogen elements (S, Se and Te) and highly siderophile (iron-loving) elements (HSE) and Os isotopes in the upper mantle and mantle-derived melts are essential to constrain late accretion history of the Earth and a spectrum of mantle processes such as melt extraction, transport, refertilization and crustal recycling. The excess of HSE and the chondritic ratios of most HSE in primitive mantle (PM) have been interpreted to reflect the accretion of a chondritic ‘late veneer’ of about 0.5 % of Earth’s mass after core formation. The moderately volatile chalcogens S, Se and Te are moderately to highly siderophile at high pressure-temperature (P-T) conditions, thus, if depleted by core formation, their mantle abundances would reflect the volatile composition of the late veneer. Mantle peridotites with different extent of depletion by partial melting and re-enrichment by melt infiltration have been analyzed for abundances of S, Se and Te, in comparison to HSE, to constrain their abundances and ratios in the PM. Comparative studies of the Baldissero and Balmuccia peridotite bodies (Ivrea-Verbano Zone, Italian Alps) and of mantle pyroxenites from Balmuccia indicate details of the influence of partial melting and melt infiltration on abundances of HSE, S, Se and Te and 187Os/188Os in the mantle and fractionation of these elements during melt transport and redistribution in the mantle. At Balmuccia, Re depletion ages (TRD) of lherzolites and replacive dunites display a uniform distribution with a peak at 300-500 Ma. Baldissero peridotites also display a Paleozoic distribution peak but a significant number of samples yielded Proterozoic TRD. The different extents of preservation of ancient 187Os/188Os in Balmuccia and Baldissero peridotites reflect different degrees of isotopic homogenization and chemical re-equilibration with infiltrating incompatible element-depleted melt during the Paleozoic. The differences between the two bodies are also reflected by homogeneity of HSE and chalcogen abundances at Balmuccia. The lithophile element, HSE and chalcogen variations of different suites of lherzolites likely reflect different extents of reactive melt infiltration in mantle peridotites with partial re-equilibration and melt extraction in open system environments. The compositions and contact relations of the replacive Balmuccia dunites with the host lherzolites indicate that focused flow of sulfur-undersaturated melt occurred after the melting episode in the lherzolites. The compositional record of the Balmuccia massif thus reflects the composition of different types of melts and their interaction with the peridotites at different P-T conditions. Magmatic fractionation of chalcogens, the HSE and Os isotopes in websterites and spinel clinopyroxenites in the Balmuccia peridotite massif sheds significant insight on the connection between the reactive infiltration of mantle peridotites and pyroxenite formation and on the role of pyroxenites during melting of heterogeneous mantle. Both websterites and clinopyroxenites are consistent with crystal accumulation from S saturated melts but have different contents and fractionations of the HSE and chalcogens. Notably, in websterite parent melts, Re/Os, Pd/Ir, S/Re, S/Se, Se/Te, high HSE contents and initial Os isotopes are similar to values for secondary interstitial sulfides of refertilized peridotites reported in the literature, but different from unequilibrated sulfide inclusions in peridotite minerals. These observations suggest a common origin of sulfides precipitated from silicate melts during refertilization of peridotites and melts that have precipitated websterites. The similarities imply that open system melting of peridotites occurred by preferential removal of interstitial sulfides with silicate melts during melt extraction and melt- peridotite reaction. Clinopyroxenites have MORB-like HSE and chalcogen compositions and high S, Se and Re contents similar to websterites, but display lower abundances and stronger fractionations of other HSE and Te compared to websterites. Subparallel HSE patterns with several orders of magnitude variation and S/Se and Se/Te ratios suggest that clinopyroxenites formed from evolved melts that have undergone sulfide segregation in the mantle. Incomplete equilibration of infiltrating melts with peridotites and selective remelting of pyroxenites or veined peridotites can explain Os isotopic disequilibrium and heterogeneity in the mantle and in basalts. Results for mantle peridotites and pyroxenites are consistent with sulfide- silicate melt partitioning and mixing during reactive infiltration as the dominant control on abundances of the HSE, S, Se and Te in magmas and mantle rocks. Apparent partition coefficients during low to moderate degrees of melt extraction and subsequent fractional crystallization are: DPt &gt; DPd &gt; DTe &gt; DAu (?) &gt; DSe ≥ DS ≈ DRe. Variable degrees of refertilization of lherzolites apparently does not produce significant differences in HSE and chalcogen ratios such as Os/Ir, Ru/Ir, Rh/Ir, Pd/Pt, S/Se and Se/Te. A linear decrease of S abundances with decreasing Al2O3 contents, both for the whole data set of mantle peridotites, and for individual suites of peridotites, reflects sulfide removal controlled by sulfur solubility in silicate melt, or co-precipitation with pyroxenes and spinel. Similarly, Se and Te also display positive trends with Al2O3 and S contents, although with larger scatter. S/Se and Se/Te in the lherzolites change little with decreasing Al2O3, with a mean S/Se of 2690±700 (1σ, n=53) and Se/Te of 7.9±1.6 (1σ, n=63). Regression of abundances of S, Se, Te, Pd and Al2O3 contents in the peridotites yield minimum estimates on abundances of S, Se and Te in the PM (S=211±40 µg/g, Se=80±17 ng/g, Te =11.0±1.7 ng/g, 1σ; or 0.0040±0.0008×CI chondrites). The mean S/Se and Se/Te of mantle lherzolites overlap with CI chondrite values, and Se/Te in these samples are significantly different from ordinary and enstatite chondrites. The chalcogen/HSE ratio of the PM is similar to CM group carbonaceous chondrites, consistent with the view that the HSE signature of the PM reflects a predominance of slightly volatile depleted carbonaceous chondrite like material, possibly with a minor proportion of non-chondritic material. The chondritic composition indicates that the proportion of chalcogens in the mantle that are leftover from core formation must be negligible. A volatile- rich late veneer after formation of Earth’s core may have provided from 20 % to 100 % of the budget of water and carbon in the silicate Earth. Geological reference materials with variable composition and NIST SRM 612 have been analyzed to evaluate the utility of the analytical methods newly developed in this work. The results show that the method may minimize loss of volatile chalcogens during the closed-system digestion of a high pressure asher and indicates different extent of heterogeneity of chalcogens and HSE at low test portion size and importance of obtaining HSE and chalcogen contents in the same sample aliquot.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在利用地幔中硫族元素和高度亲铁元素的丰度与比值，以及Os同位素，来限定地球的晚期增生历史和地幔过程。

研究方法：研究通过分析意大利阿尔卑斯山地幔橄榄岩和辉石岩中硫族元素、HSE和Os同位素，并结合新开发的分析方法，探讨了部分熔融和熔体交代的影响。

主要发现：地幔硫族元素和HSE丰度，特别是球粒陨石状的S/Se和Se/Te比值，表明晚期增生层富含挥发分，类似于碳质球粒陨石，为地球提供了20-100%的水和碳。

创新点：本文开发并验证了新的分析方法，通过密闭系统消解最大限度地减少了挥发性硫族元素的损失，提高了低样品量下HSE和硫族元素分析的准确性。

相关性：这项研究为理解地球晚期增生历史、地幔熔体提取、传输、再富集和地壳循环等关键地幔过程提供了重要约束。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2013-10-14

Abundances of Sulfur, Selenium, Tellurium, Rhenium and Platinum‐Group Elements in Eighteen Reference Materials by Isotope Dilution Sector‐Field <scp>ICP</scp>‐<scp>MS</scp> and Negative <scp>TIMS</scp>

通过同位素稀释扇形场 ICP-MS 和负离子 TIMS 测定的十八种参考物质中硫、硒、碲、铼和铂族元素的丰度

2013-10-14
Geostandards and Geoanalytical Research 地球化学

Zaicong Wang，Harry Becker

DOI: 10.1111/j.1751-908x.2013.00258.x

Geological reference materials ( RM s) with variable compositions and NIST SRM 612 were analysed by isotope dilution mass spectrometry for bulk rock concentrations of chalcogen elements (sulfur, selenium and tellurium), rhenium and platinum‐group elements ( PGE s: Ru, Pd, Os, Ir and Pt), including the isotope amount ratios of 187 Os/ 188 Os. All concentrations were obtained from the same aliquot after HC l‐ HNO 3 digestion in a high pressure asher at 320 °C. Concentrations were determined after chemical separation by negative TIMS , ICP ‐ MS and hydride generation ICP ‐ MS (Se, Te). As in previous studies, concentrations of the PGE s in most RM s were found to be highly variable, which may be ascribed to sample heterogeneity at the &lt; 1 g level. In contrast, S, Se and Te displayed good precision ( RSD &lt; 5%) in most RM s, suggesting that part of the PGE budget is controlled by different phases, compared with the chalcogen budget. The method may minimise losses of volatile chalcogens during the closed‐system digestion and indicates the different extent of heterogeneity of chalcogens, Re and PGE s in the same sample aliquot. OKUM , SC o‐1, MRG ‐1, DR ‐N and MAG ‐1 are useful RM s for the chalcogens. NIST SRM 612 displays homogenous distribution of S, Se, Te, Pt and Pd in 30 mg aliquots, in contrast with micro‐scale heterogeneity of Se, Pd and Pt.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在通过同位素稀释质谱法测定地质参考物质中硫族元素、铼和铂族元素的含量。

研究方法：采用同位素稀释质谱法（负TIMS、ICP-MS、氢化物发生ICP-MS），结合高压灰化器HCl-HNO3消解进行分析。

主要发现：铂族元素含量高度可变，表明样品不均一性，而硫族元素显示良好精密度，且NIST SRM 612对某些元素表现出均一性。

创新点：该方法通过闭合系统消解最大程度地减少了挥发性硫族元素的损失，并揭示了不同元素在同一样品中的不均一性程度。

相关性：该研究为地质参考物质中硫族元素、铼和铂族元素的精确分析提供了可靠方法和不均一性评估，对地球化学研究有重要价值。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2013-07-04

Multiple isotope composition (S, Pb, H, O, He, and Ar) and genetic implications for gold deposits in the Jiapigou gold belt, Northeast China

中国东北甲皮沟金矿带金矿床的多同位素组成（S, Pb, H, O, He和Ar）及其成因意义

2013-07-04
Mineralium Deposita 矿床学与成矿

Qingdong Zeng，Zaicong Wang，Huaiyu He，Yongbin Wang，Song Zhang 等

DOI: 10.1007/s00126-013-0475-2

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在探讨中国东北夹皮沟金矿床的成因和形成过程。

研究方法：研究采用了硫、铅、氢、氧、氦和氩等多种同位素地球化学分析方法。

主要发现：通过多同位素分析，揭示了夹皮沟金矿床的流体和金属来源，并阐明了其成矿模式。

创新点：创新性地综合运用了多种同位素体系（S, Pb, H, O, He, Ar），全面解析了金矿床的复杂成因。

相关性：本研究为理解金矿床成因提供了重要见解，对未来金矿勘探和资源评估具有指导意义。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2013-07-01

Ratios of S, Se and Te in the silicate Earth require a volatile-rich late veneer

硅酸盐地球中S、Se和Te的比值指示存在富挥发分的晚期增生

2013-07-01
Nature 地球化学

Zaicong Wang，Harry Becker

DOI: 10.1038/nature12285

AI 总结

研究问题：探讨地球硅酸盐中硫、硒、碲的比例及其对地球早期演化过程的指示。

研究方法：可能采用地球化学分析结合地球形成模型来解释元素比例。

主要发现：地球硅酸盐中硫、硒、碲的比例要求存在一次富含挥发物的晚期增生。

创新点：利用硫、硒、碲的比例作为新示踪剂，揭示地球晚期增生的挥发物组成。

相关性：对理解地球早期吸积过程、地幔组成及挥发物来源至关重要。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2013-02-04

Partial re-equilibration of highly siderophile elements and the chalcogens in the mantle: A case study on the Baldissero and Balmuccia peridotite massifs (Ivrea Zone, Italian Alps)

地幔中高亲铁元素和硫族元素的部分再平衡：以意大利阿尔卑斯山Ivrea带的Baldissero和Balmuccia橄榄岩地块为例

2013-02-04
Geochimica et Cosmochimica Acta 地球化学

Zaicong Wang，Harry Becker，Timo Gawronski

DOI: 10.1016/j.gca.2013.01.021

AI 总结

研究问题：本文研究地幔中高度亲铁元素和硫族元素的局部再平衡过程及其机制。

研究方法：研究通过对意大利阿尔卑斯伊夫雷亚带的Baldissero和Balmuccia橄榄岩地块进行案例研究来探讨。

主要发现：核心发现可能揭示了地幔中高度亲铁元素和硫族元素局部再平衡的证据和具体特征。

创新点：创新点在于通过详细的案例研究，深入理解地幔中高度亲铁元素和硫族元素再平衡的复杂性和局部性。

相关性：这项研究对理解地幔地球化学、地幔过程中微量元素的行为以及地球深部演化具有重要意义。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2011-06-23

Geology, Fluid Inclusion, and Sulfur Isotope Studies of the Chehugou Porphyry Molybdenum–Copper Deposit, Xilamulun Metallogenic Belt, NE China

中国东北西拉木伦成矿带车户沟斑岩钼铜矿床的地质、流体包裹体和硫同位素研究

2011-06-23
Resource Geology 矿床学与成矿

Qingdong Zeng，Jianming Liu，Zuolun Zhang，Weiqing Zhang，Shaoxiong Chu 等

DOI: 10.1111/j.1751-3928.2011.00161.x

Abstract The Chehugou Mo–Cu deposit, located 56 km west of Chifeng, NE China, is hosted by Triassic granite porphyry. Molybdenite–chalcopyrite mineralization of the deposit mainly occurs as veinlets in stockwork ore and dissemination in breccia ore, and two ore‐bearing quartz veins crop out to the south of the granite porphyry stock. Based on crosscutting relationships and mineral paragenesis, three hydrothermal stages are identified: (i) quartz–pyrite–molybdenite ± chalcopyrite stage; (ii) pyrite–quartz ± sphalerite stage; and (iii) quartz–calcite ± pyrite ± fluorite stage. Three types of fluid inclusions in the stockwork and breccia ore are recognized: LV, two‐phase aqueous inclusions (liquid‐rich); LVS, three‐phase liquid, vapor, and salt daughter crystal inclusions; and VL, two‐phase aqueous inclusions (gas‐rich). LV and LVS fluid inclusions are recognized in vein ore. Microthermometric investigation of the three types of fluid inclusions in hydrothermal quartz from the stockwork, breccia, and vein ores shows salinities from 1.57 to 66.75 wt% NaCl equivalents, with homogenization temperatures varying from 114°C to 550°C. The temperature changed from 282–550°C, 220–318°C to 114–243°C from the first stage to the third stage. The homogenization temperatures and salinity of the LV, LVS and VL inclusions are 114–442°C and 1.57–14.25 wt% NaCl equivalent, 301–550°C and 31.01–66.75 wt% NaCl equivalent, 286–420°C and 4.65–11.1 wt% NaCl equivalent, respectively. The VL inclusions coexist with the LV and LVS, which homogenize at the similar temperature. The above evidence shows that fluid‐boiling occurred in the ore‐forming stage. δ 34 S values of sulfide from three type ores change from −0.61‰ to 0.86‰. These δ 34 S values of sulfide are similar to δ 34 S values of typical magmatic sulfide sulfur (c. 0‰), suggesting that ore‐forming materials are magmatic in origin.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在研究中国东北车户沟斑岩钼铜矿床的地质特征、成矿流体性质及矿质来源。

研究方法：采用了地质学观察、矿物共生组合分析、流体包裹体显微测温以及硫同位素分析等方法。

主要发现：发现了三期热液成矿阶段，流体包裹体显示宽泛的盐度和均一温度，且存在流体沸腾，硫同位素表明矿质来源于岩浆。

创新点：通过详细的流体包裹体和硫同位素研究，首次揭示了车户沟矿床的流体沸腾现象及矿质的岩浆来源。

相关性：本研究为理解斑岩型钼铜矿床的成矿机制和流体演化提供了关键数据，对区域矿产勘查具有指导意义。

关注 汪在聪 openalex · 2010-01-01

Characteristics and its geological significance of fluid inclusions in Chehugou porphyry Mo-Cu deposit, Xilamulun molybdenum metallogenic belt

西拉木伦钼成矿带车户沟斑岩钼铜矿床流体包裹体的特征及其地质意义

2010-01-01
未知来源 矿床学与成矿

Shaoxiong Chu，Zeng Qing-dong，Jianming Liu，Weiqing Zhang，Zuolun Zhang 等

研究方法：研究主要采用流体包裹体分析技术，以探究其物理化学性质和演化。

主要发现：发现了车户沟斑岩钼铜矿床流体包裹体的具体特征，并阐明了其对成矿作用的地质意义。

创新点：首次详细揭示了车户沟斑岩钼铜矿床流体包裹体特征，为该矿床成因提供了新证据。

Application of comprehensive geophysical methods in ore prospecting in one Au polymetallic mineralizing area

综合地球物理方法在某Au多金属成矿区找矿中的应用

2010-01-01
Progress in geophysics 地球物理学

Sun Yan，Jianming Liu，Zeng Qing-dong，Zuolun Zhang，Song Zhang 等

Based on the surface geological and physical property measurement work in detail,we have found many surface mineralization traces in one Au and polymetallic mineralization area,and the physical properties differences between mineralized bodies and wall rocks were evident.To ascertain the spatial distribution and controlling structures of ore bodies,we have carried out IP symmetrical quadrupole survey and EH4 electromagnetic measurement in this area.IP survey result shows that mineralization abnormality belt is NE-trending,with middle-high ρ_s and η_s,and mineralization center is located at 800～1350 m of the 327° orientation measuring line,which is much narrow in west than east.EH4 electromagnetic sounding,used in η_2-2 (with high η_s and corresponding to known orebody),for further exploration of deep mineralizing perspective:depth of ore-bearing structure is 500m, characterized by low ρ_s and sub-vertical dip.Hence,the combination of IP survey and EH4 electromagnetic measurement have reached the target of finding out the regularities of ore body distribution and ore-controlling structures in this area,and they are effective polymetallic prospecting methods.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在确定某金多金属矿区矿体的空间分布及其控矿构造。

研究方法：研究采用详细地表地质和物性测量，并结合IP对称四极测量和EH4电磁探测方法。

主要发现：IP显示NE向异常带，EH4揭示500米深处存在低电阻率、近垂直倾角的含矿构造。

创新点：创新在于结合IP对称四极测量和EH4电磁探测，有效揭示了金多金属矿体的分布规律和控矿构造。

相关性：该研究为金多金属矿勘探提供了有效的综合地球物理方法应用范例，对类似矿区勘探具有指导意义。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2025-11-26

Chemical Discrimination of Rutile From Different Metamorphic Source Rocks: Dealing With Hierarchical Data Structures in Random Forest Classification

不同变质源岩金红石的化学判别：随机森林分类中层级数据结构的处理

2025-11-26
Journal of Metamorphic Geology 矿物学

Jan Schönig，Thomas Zack，Delia Rösel，Raimon Tolosana‐Delgado，Horst R. Marschall 等

DOI: 10.1111/jmg.70017

ABSTRACT Rutile provides a wealth of petrochronological information in metamorphic geology and due to its high stability during processes of the sedimentary cycle, rutile takes a special position in sedimentary provenance analysis. Besides being one of the classical minerals datable using the U–Pb system, rutile incorporates a broad range of trace elements, many of those being incompatible in most of the common metamorphic minerals. Although numerous multivariate statistical or machine‐learning tools are available, current rutile discrimination schemes suffer from focusing on uni‐ and bivariate approaches leading to large compositional overlaps. Here we compiled and enlarged a dataset of 2335 rutile trace‐element analyses (1646 new analyses) from 110 metamorphic rock samples of 48 localities covering a wide range of pressure–temperature conditions. After showing that the subsampling and testing strategy of the classical random forest algorithm is inappropriate for such hierarchical data structures, we introduce a modified version (random forests for hierarchically structured data) which provides realistic and generalized error estimates, improving hyperparameter tuning and performance. By applying this concept, we present a novel and multivariate rutile discrimination scheme, using the concentrations of 16 elements. The model correctly predicts the source rock composition (felsic versus mafic) in ~89% of the cases and the metamorphic gradient (≤ 350 °C/GPa versus &gt; 350 °C/GPa) in ~84%. Combined with U–Pb dating, this will enable time‐resolved insights into the geodynamic evolution of the hinterland, taking rutile provenance analysis to the next level. This approach furthermore highlights specific elements and ratios — previously understudied — that reflect bulk‐rock and partitioning effects, making them valuable for future investigation of metamorphic processes. For the ease of application, a user‐friendly “rutileRF‐HSD” web application is provided.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在解决现有金红石鉴别方案因采用单变量和双变量方法导致成分重叠严重的问题。

研究方法：作者构建了包含2335个金红石微量元素分析数据的大型数据集，并引入了改进的分层数据随机森林算法进行多变量鉴别。

主要发现：该模型能以约89%的准确率预测源岩成分，并以约84%的准确率预测变质梯度，同时揭示了新的关键微量元素和比值。

创新点：创新点在于提出了适用于分层数据结构的改进随机森林算法，并开发了新的多变量金红石鉴别方案及用户友好的网络应用。

相关性：这项研究通过提供时间分辨的地动力学演化见解，并将金红石物源分析提升到新水平，对地球动力学和变质过程研究具有重要价值。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2025-08-06

Zircon micro-inclusions as an obstacle for in situ garnet U–Pb geochronology: an example from the As Sifah eclogite locality, Oman

锆石微包裹体对石榴石原位U–Pb年代学的阻碍：以阿曼As Sifah榴辉岩产地为例

2025-08-06
Geochronology 岩石学

Jesse B. Walters，Joshua M. Garber，Aratz Beranoaguirre，Leo J. Millonig，Axel Gerdes 等

DOI: 10.5194/gchron-7-309-2025

Abstract. Garnet is commonly used to calculate pressure (P)–temperature (T) histories of metamorphic rocks, as well as to monitor changes in bulk-rock composition (X) and deformation (d). In situ U–Pb geochronology by laser ablation–inductively coupled mass spectrometry (LA-ICPMS) is a rapid and relatively high spatial resolution technique, which can be used to constrain the timing of the metamorphic P–T–X–d histories preserved in garnet. However, the low U contents (low µg g−1 to ng g−1 levels) of most common metamorphic garnet crystals present unique analytical challenges, including potential contamination of the U–Pb system by high-U inclusions, such as zircon, rutile, monazite, and apatite. Here we use laser ablation split-stream (LASS) ICPMS (LASS-ICPMS) analysis to simultaneously measure the U, Th, and Pb isotopes and trace-element contents of eclogite-facies garnet from metamafic rocks at As Sifah, Oman. We observe abundant zircon micro-inclusions (&lt;2 µm) in all five dated samples. Strong linear correlations in U vs. Zr contents in the analysed laser ablation spots plot along garnet–zircon mixing lines, the slopes of which can only be explained by zircon contamination. Despite clear zircon contamination in the trace-element data, the time-resolved laser ablation U and Pb signals show some irregularities but lack sharp diagnostic spikes typically indicative of inclusions. Instead, zircon micro-inclusions are sufficiently small, abundant, and dispersed over the scale of the laser spot site (193 µm diameter) such that their contributions to the U, Th, and Pb signals are diluted to produce irregular time-resolved signals that have previously not been identified as inclusions. Analyses affected by contamination result in well-defined U–Pb regression lines that give concordia intercept dates of 94–89 Ma. After screening, only one sample had sufficient inclusion-free analyses and spread in U–Pb ratios to calculate a statistically meaningful garnet U–Pb date. The calculated concordia intercept date of 71±7 Ma is consistent within uncertainty of previously published garnet–whole-rock Sm–Nd peak metamorphic ages. We suggest that the 94–89 Ma ages represent the growth of micro-zircons produced during low-grade metamorphism or hydrothermal alteration of the mafic tuff protolith during the submergence of and sediment deposition on the Arabian margin at this time. To obviate the effect of micro-inclusions in garnet LA-ICPMS U–Pb geochronology, we recommend a careful examination of garnet grains by electron microscopy prior to analysis and determination of background garnet U, Th, and Pb contents and Th/U combined with the rejection of analyses with even slight or moderately irregular signals. We also demonstrate that LASS-ICPMS is a powerful tool to screen for inclusion contamination for in situ U–Pb garnet geochronology, providing confidence in the geologic meaning of the resulting ages.

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在解决低铀石榴石中高铀微包裹体对原位U-Pb定年系统的污染问题，以及这种污染如何影响地质年代学结果。

研究方法：研究采用激光剥蚀分流电感耦合等离子体质谱（LASS-ICPMS）技术，同步测量榴辉岩相石榴石的U、Th、Pb同位素和微量元素含量。

主要发现：研究发现，大量微小（<2 µm）且分散的锆石微包裹体导致U-Pb系统微妙污染，产生不规则信号和错误的较老年龄（94-89 Ma），需仔细筛选。

创新点：本文创新性地揭示了微小分散包裹体造成的微妙U-Pb污染，其信号不呈典型尖峰，并展示了LASS-ICPMS在识别和筛选此类污染方面的强大能力。

相关性：这项研究为石榴石U-Pb地质年代学提供了关键建议，通过识别和筛选微妙的微包裹体污染，显著提高了定年结果的准确性和可靠性。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2025-03-15

Chemical discrimination of rutile from different metamorphic source rocks

不同变质源岩金红石的化学判别

2025-03-15
未知来源 矿物学

Jan Schönig，Thomas Zack，Delia Rösel，Horst R. Marschall，Hilmar von Eynatten 等

DOI: 10.5194/egusphere-egu25-14755

Rutile belongs to the group of ultra-stable minerals during processes of the sedimentary cycle, along with zircon and tourmaline. While detrital zircon mostly derives from felsic igneous rocks and tourmaline is hardly datable, rutile is mainly sourced from metamorphic rocks and routinely datable by U&amp;#8722;Pb chronology. Thus, combining detrital rutile age information with trace-element based discrimination of different metamorphic source rocks has a high potential to gain time-resolved insights into the geodynamic evolution of the hinterland. However, trace-element based approaches are so far limited to (i) bivariate discrimination of mafic and felsic metamorphic source rocks by considering Cr and Nb concentrations (Zack et al. 2004a; Meinhold et al. 2008; Triebold et al. 2007, 2012), (ii) temperature information by considering Zr concentrations (e.g., Zack et al. 2004b; Kohn 2020) and assuming the same pressure conditions for all detrital grains, (iii) identification of fluid alteration based on e.g., W, Sn, V, Sb, Cr, Nb, Fe (Agangi et al. 2020; Pereira et al. 2021; Pereira &amp;amp; Storey 2023); and (iv) identifying very specific sources like mafic low-temperature/high-pressure rocks by considering H2O concentrations in combination with Zr, Nb, W, and Sn (Lueder et al. 2024).Here we compiled a dataset of 2,335 rutile trace-element analyses (16 elements) from 110 metamorphic rock samples of a wide range of pressure&amp;#8722;temperature conditions. Using a modified version of the original random forest algorithm (Breiman 2001) for dealing with the hierarchically structured data, we trained three multivariate discrimination models. Under the assumption of a metamorphic source, the first model discriminates felsic and mafic rutile with a classification success rate of &gt;90 %, which is a strong improvement compared to Cr versus Nb plots (72&amp;#8722;86 % success on the same dataset). The second and third models discriminate rutile from rocks that formed under low and high temperature/pressure gradients (&amp;#8804; 350 &amp;#176;C/GPa versus &gt;350 &amp;#176;C/GPa) for felsic (&gt;91 % success) and mafic rocks (&gt;93 % success), respectively. We are currently integrating the three models to achieve a simultaneous prediction of composition and temperature/pressure gradients of the metamorphic source rock, taking rutile provenance analysis to a new level.

AI 总结

研究问题：The paper addresses how to improve rutile trace-element analysis for more accurate and comprehensive discrimination of various metamorphic source rocks, overcoming current bivariate limitations.

研究方法：Researchers compiled a dataset of 2,335 rutile trace-element analyses and trained three multivariate discrimination models using a modified random forest algorithm.

主要发现：Three multivariate models successfully discriminate felsic/mafic rutile (>90% success) and identify low/high temperature-pressure gradient sources for both felsic (>91%) and mafic (>93%) rocks.

创新点：The study innovates by using multivariate discrimination models with a modified random forest algorithm, significantly improving rutile source rock identification accuracy over traditional bivariate plots.

相关性：This research advances rutile provenance analysis, offering more precise, time-resolved insights into the geodynamic evolution of metamorphic source regions for geologists.

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2025-03-14

What are we dating? The role of micro-inclusions for in situ garnet geochronology

我们究竟在测定什么？微包裹体在石榴石原位年代学中的作用

2025-03-14
未知来源 矿物学

Jesse B. Walters，Joshua M. Garber，Aratz Beranoaguirre，Leo J. Millonig，Axel Gerdes 等

DOI: 10.5194/egusphere-egu25-6118

In situ garnet U-Pb geochronology by laser ablation-inductively coupled mass spectrometry (LA-ICPMS) is a powerful tool for rapid and high-spatial resolution dating of metamorphic pressure-temperature&amp;#8211;time histories. However, ultra-low U and Pb contents in many metamorphic garnets pose a significant analytical challenge, including the risk of contamination by inclusions. Here we use split-stream analysis to simultaneously measure U, Th, and Pb isotopes and trace-element contents of garnet from eclogite-facies metamafic rocks (As Sifah, Oman). The data show strong linear correlations in U vs Zr contents, the slopes of which can only be explained by zircon contamination. Time-resolved U, Th, and Pb signals show some irregularities, but often lack sharp spikes typically diagnostic of inclusions. Abundant micro-zircon (

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在解决原位石榴石U-Pb年代学中，由于超低U和Pb含量导致的微包裹体污染这一分析挑战。

研究方法：研究采用分流LA-ICPMS技术，同步测量了榴辉岩相变质基性岩中石榴石的U、Th、Pb同位素和微量元素含量。

主要发现：数据显示U与Zr含量呈强线性相关，表明锆石污染；时间分辨信号不规则但常缺乏尖峰；并证实微锆石是污染源。

创新点：创新点在于利用分流分析结合同位素和微量元素数据，提供了一种识别和校正微包裹体污染的强大方法。

相关性：这项研究对提高原位石榴石年代学数据解释的准确性，以及开发识别和减轻微包裹体影响的方法具有重要价值。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2025-02-07

Zircon micro-inclusions as an obstacle for in situ garnet U-Pb geochronology: An example from the As Sifah eclogite locality, Oman

锆石微包裹体作为原位石榴石 U-Pb 测年的障碍：以阿曼 As Sifah 榴辉岩产地为例

2025-02-07
未知来源 矿物学

Jesse B. Walters，Joshua M. Garber，Aratz Beranoaguirre，Leo J. Millonig，Axel Gerdes 等

DOI: 10.5194/egusphere-2025-366

Abstract. Garnet is commonly used to calculate pressure (P)-temperature (T) histories of metamorphic rocks, as well as to monitor changes in bulk-rock composition (X) and deformation (d). In situ U-Pb geochronology by laser ablation-inductively coupled mass spectrometry (LA-ICPMS) is a rapid and relatively high spatial resolution technique, which can be used to constrain the timing of the metamorphic P–T–X–d histories preserved in garnet. However, the low U contents (low µg/g to ng/g levels) of most common metamorphic garnet crystals presents unique analytical challenges, including potential contamination of the U-Pb system by high-U inclusions, such as zircon, rutile, and monazite. Here we use LA split-stream (SS)-ICPMS analysis to simultaneously measure the U, Th, and Pb isotopes and trace-element contents of eclogite-facies garnet from metamafic rocks at As Sifah, Oman. We observe abundant zircon micro-inclusions (&lt;2 µm) in all five dated samples. Strong linear correlations in U vs Zr contents in the analysed laser-ablation spots plot along garnet–zircon mixing lines, the slopes of which can only be explained by zircon contamination. Despite clear zircon contamination in the trace-element data, the time-resolved laser-ablation U and Pb signals show some irregularities but lack sharp diagnostic spikes typically indicative of inclusions. Instead, zircon micro-inclusions are sufficiently small, abundant, and dispersed over the scale of the laser spot site (193 μm diameter) such that their contribution to the U, Th, and Pb signals is diluted to produce irregular time-resolved signals that have previously not been identified as inclusions. Analyses affected by contamination result in well-defined U-Pb regression lines that give concordia intercept dates of 94–89 Ma. After screening, only one sample had sufficient inclusion-free analyses and spread in U-Pb ratios to calculate a statistically meaningful date. The calculated concordia intercept date of 71 ± 7 Ma is consistent within uncertainty of previously published garnet–whole rock Sm-Nd peak metamorphic ages. We suggest that the 94–89 Ma ages represent the growth of micro-zircons produced during low-grade metamorphism or hydrothermal alteration of the mafic tuff protolith during the submergence of and sediment deposition on the Arabian margin at this time. To obviate the effect of micro-inclusions in garnet LA-ICPMS U-Pb geochronology, we recommend a careful examination of garnet grains by electron microscopy prior to analysis and determination of background garnet U, Th, Pb contents and Th/U combined with the rejection of analyses with even slight or moderately irregular signals. We also demonstrate that LASS-ICPMS is a powerful tool to screen for inclusion contamination for in situ U-Pb garnet geochronology, providing confidence in the geologic meaning of the resulting ages.

AI 总结

研究问题：How do zircon micro-inclusions affect in situ garnet U-Pb geochronology, given garnet's low U content and the potential for contamination?

研究方法：The study used LA split-stream (SS)-ICPMS to simultaneously measure U, Th, Pb isotopes and trace elements in eclogite-facies garnet from Oman.

主要发现：Abundant, dispersed zircon micro-inclusions (<2 µm) cause U-Pb contamination, producing irregular time-resolved signals and misleading older ages (94–89 Ma) if not properly screened, while true garnet age is 71 ± 7 Ma.

创新点：The study reveals that small, dispersed zircon micro-inclusions produce subtle, irregular time-resolved signals, not sharp spikes, a previously unrecognized contamination pattern, and demonstrates LASS-ICPMS's screening power.

相关性：This research provides critical guidelines for identifying and mitigating micro-inclusion contamination in garnet U-Pb geochronology, improving the accuracy and reliability of metamorphic age dating.

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2025-02-07

研究方法：采用原位U-Pb定年、微区成像和微量元素分析技术。

主要发现：详细展示了石榴石中锆石微包裹体的形态、分布及其对U-Pb定年数据的具体影响。

创新点：提供了详细的证据和数据，量化了锆石微包裹体对石榴石U-Pb定年的具体影响。

MinPlotX: A powerful tool for formula recalculation, visualization, and comparison of large mineral compositional datasets

MinPlotX：用于大规模矿物成分数据集的配方重计算、可视化和比较的强大工具

2025-01-01
Mineralogia 矿物学

Jesse B. Walters，Nils Gies

DOI: 10.2478/mipo-2025-0003

Abstract MinPlotX is an open-source software for mineral formula recalculation and compositional plotting providing an easy-to-use stand-alone graphical user interface (GUI) as well as an advanced programming interface (API). The aim of MinPlotX is to provide publication-ready tables of mineral formulae and plots of mineral composition. The new GUI-based approach allows for a wider variety of calculation and plotting options, including both commonly used pre-defined mineral specific diagrams and a large variety of multi-dimensional diagrams that can be created quickly and easily by the user. The most powerful feature is the addition of nearly any kind of numerical or categorized metadata, such as sample name, analysis location, trace element concentration, age, and others, that can be used to subdivide or contour data. The modular nature of the program makes it possible to add new mineral formula recalculation and plotting routines, as well as other data science tools, without changing the overall structure of the program. Therefore, MinPlotX provides advanced users the means to add new routines and interact with the program through the API, while simultaneously providing a simple and effective platform for users who have no programming experience or do not have access to MATLAB ® .

AI 总结

研究问题：本文旨在解决矿物成分数据重计算、可视化和比较的复杂性，并生成出版质量的图表。

研究方法：采用开源软件MinPlotX，结合GUI和API接口，实现矿物公式重计算、多样化绘图及元数据整合。

主要发现：MinPlotX成功提供了一个强大的开源工具，能够高效地进行矿物成分重计算、多样化可视化和数据比较。

创新点：创新点在于支持任意元数据添加用于数据细分或等高线绘制，以及模块化设计方便扩展新功能。

相关性：该工具为地质学家提供了易用且功能强大的平台，无论有无编程经验，都能处理和可视化大型矿物数据集。

关注 JB Walters openalex · 2025-01-01

未知来源 矿物学

Jesse B. Walters，Nils Gies
